biography_text: COLLINS, Doug, a Representative from Georgia; born in Gainesville, Hall County, Ga., August 16, 1966; graduated from North Hall High School, Gainesville, Ga.; B.A., North Georgia College, Dahlonega, Ga., 1988; M.Div., New Orleans Theological Seminary, New Orleans, La., 1996; J.D., John Marshall Law School, Atlanta, Ga., 2008; United States Air Force Reserve, 2002-present; pastor; lawyer, private practice; businessman; member of the Georgia state house of representatives, 2007-2012; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Thirteenth and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2013-present).
